response.original_title: Mundus Inversus: Two Stories from The Cadence
response.overview: An old womanâ€™s solitary existence in the woods is haunted by a mysterious presence. A world turned upside down is seen through the eyes of a goat-riding witch. Catchpenny prints and old woodcuts come to life in these short animations by artist Luca Dipierro, taken from his latest film The Cadence. A puppet play filmed in stop motion with tiny cut out marionettes made of book cloth, paper and fabric.
response.title: Mundus Inversus: Two Stories from The Cadence
